Rebecca Solnit.
I decided to put these crazy 4 months in my professional CV as I don't want to forget what I learnt during March-June 2020 in any position in my future career. I was lucky to have 4 months with no official commitment to deeply think and rethink about the system that we have built around ourselves. The current system in the world does not work no matter where we live as the modern life is super interdependent. We need to rebuild a new system with the focus on equity, human dignity, real international collaboration, respecting the nature and spending money on welfare for all not on making more money again and again with no collective benefits!
